title: What Does the Gold Heart Represent on Tinder?

steps.title: Tinder Gold subscribers see a gold heart icon when another user likes them.
steps.content: Tinder Gold subscribers see a gold heart icon when another user likes them. When swiping through profiles, you may notice a gold heart with lines. [1] X Research source This indicates that a user has already swiped right on you. This benefit is exclusively available to Gold and Platinum subscribers. You can see a full list of these profiles with a gold heart on the "Likes You" tab of the Tinder app (represented by a gold diamond).

steps.title: Matches made possible by the "Likes You" feature will maintain a gold heart.
steps.content: Matches made possible by the "Likes You" feature will maintain a gold heart. If you see a gold heart next to a profile in your Matches, it is because you likely matched with that person after seeing they already liked you. [2] X Research source The other user will see this gold heart as well. Some Tinder users don't like people seeing that they pay for Tinder Gold, while others may view it as a sign of commitment.

steps.title: Subscribe to Tinder Gold or Tinder Platinum.
steps.content: Subscribe to Tinder Gold or Tinder Platinum. Only subscribers can see a gold heart icon within their Deck of potential matches. [3] X Research source This wikiHow article can help you try to get Tinder Gold for free!

steps.title: Keep an eye out for the gold heart in your Matches.
steps.content: Keep an eye out for the gold heart in your Matches. If you do not want to subscribe to Tinder Gold, you will not see the gold heart within your Deck. But if you match with a Tinder Gold subscriber, there is a decent chance you will see the gold heart icon next to your conversation.
